data.comment: The match is underway at Covebo Stadion - De Koel.
Venlo have been given a penalty at Covebo Stadion - De Koel...
In the minute 25, Venlo are awarded a penalty ... Giorgos Giakoumakis botches the spot kick!
Danny Post (Venlo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Vito Van Crooij is booked for the home team.
In the minute 38, Goal! Silvester Van der Water gives Almelo a 0-1 lead.
Rai Vloet with an assist there.
In the minute 45, Richard Martens blows to end the first-half.
He's off! Adrian Szoke is shown a red card.
The second-half is now underway.
The away team replace Silvester Van der Water with Jeremy Cijntje.
In the minute 51, Jafar Arias levels the score at 1-1.
Torino Hunte instrumental with a fine assist.
Venlo make their first substitution with Chris Kum replacing Arjan Swinkels.
In the minute 63, The home team have replaced Steffen Schafer with Lukas Schmitz. This is the second substitution made today by Hans De Koning.
Venlo take a 2-1 lead thanks to Vito Van Crooij.
Great play from Giorgos Giakoumakis to set up the goal.
In the minute 75, Guus Hupperts is replacing Torino Hunte for the home team.
An attacking Almelo player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! Rai Vloet makes it 2-2. The equalizer came in the form of a penalty.
In the minute 79, Marco Rente is on a sub for Rai Vloet for Almelo.
Goal! The home team take a 3-2 lead through Giorgos Giakoumakis.
That's a fine assist from Guus Hupperts.
The match has come to a close in Venlo. The final score is 3-2.
